messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: OPERATION TAG: Silent Cobra DATE: 09/23/44  Authorities have discovered an underground fight club operating in various locations around the city. These unsanctioned events involve significant gambling and have resulted in serious injuries.  LAW ENFORCEMENT ENGAGEMENT:  VICE OPERATIONS LEAD: Captain S. T. Dawson has been tasked to dismantle the underground fight network and arrest key organizers. UNDERCOVER: Detectives U. V. Flores and W. X. Harper have infiltrated the fight club as attendees to gather intel. INTELLIGENCE: Detectives Y. Z. Garcia and A. B. Morales analyze bank transactions to trace gambling money and its flow within the club. PATROL: Patrol Officers C. D. Newman, E. F. Ortiz, and G. H. Preston monitor potential fight locations to prevent further events. MEDICAL LIAISON: Lieutenant I. J. Ross works with hospitals to track and report unusual or suspicious injuries that could be related to the fight club. ADDITIONAL DETAILS:  Local gyms have been warned to report any suspicious activity or recruitment efforts linked to these events.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Captain S. T. Dawson  
Officer Context: Captain Dawson is leading the charge to break up the underground fight club and apprehend its main organizers.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Detective U. V. Flores  
Officer Context: Detective Flores has gone undercover as an attendee to gather crucial intelligence about the fight club's operations.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective W. X. Harper  
Officer Context: Detective Harper is also undercover, assisting in collecting data about the club's events and key players.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective Y. Z. Garcia  
Officer Context: Detective Garcia is tracking bank movements to decipher the flow of gambling funds related to the club.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective A. B. Morales  
Officer Context: Detective Morales collaborates in analyzing financial transactions to unearth the monetary dynamics within the club.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officers C. D. Newman, E. F. Ortiz, and G. H. Preston  
Officer Context: These officers are on the lookout around potential fight locations, aiming to halt future unsanctioned events.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officers 

Officer Name: Lieutenant I. J. Ross  
Officer Context: Lieutenant Ross is in touch with medical facilities, collecting reports of injuries possibly tied to the underground fights.  
Officer Role: Lieutenant
